verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mother \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahaziah \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H4467"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* proceeded \w to|strong="H4191"\w* annihilate \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4467"\w* heirs.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jehosheba|strong="H3089"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sister \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahaziah, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahaziah \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stole|strong="H1589"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w* murdered. \w She|strong="H6440"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bedroom|strong="H2315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Joash \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w hidden|strong="H2244"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* nurse \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w ruled|strong="H4427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Carites|strong="H3746"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w under|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* come \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w duty|strong="H1697"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Sur|strong="H5495"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* behind \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w*. \w You|strong="H8104"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* turns \w guarding|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*—

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w divisions|strong="H4931"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w duty|strong="H4931"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w surround|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* anyone \w who|strong="H4428"\w* approaches \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ranks|strong="H7713"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* stay close \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wherever|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w goes|strong="H3318"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w ordered|strong="H6680"\w*. \w Each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w*—\w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* duty \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w off|strong="H3318"\w* duty—\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w spears|strong="H2595"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w shields|strong="H7982"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w south|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* north \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3318"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w presented|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* proclaimed \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w clapped|strong="H5221"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* declared, “\w Long|strong="H5921"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*!”

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, she \w went|strong="H5971"\w* \w out|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w custom|strong="H4941"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w trumpeters|strong="H2689"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8056"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w blowing|strong="H8628"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w screamed|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Treason|strong="H7195"\w*! \w Treason|strong="H7195"\w*!”

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w ordered|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, “\w Bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* between \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ranks|strong="H7713"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* follows \w her|strong="H3318"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w seized|strong="H7760"\w* Athaliah \w as|strong="H1004"\w* she reached \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*’ \w entrance|strong="H3996"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* grounds, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* she \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* between \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* between \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w went|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tore|strong="H5422"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w smashed|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* idols \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w Mattan|strong="H4977"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* posted \w guards|strong="H6486"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Carites|strong="H3746"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* entered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Guards|strong="H7323"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Joash \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H8252"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*.
Joash was seven years old when he became king.
